Other Information.Test Conditions: 298 K, 0.5 M KCl electrolyte, scan rate: 10 mV/s
Other Information.Additional Info: Well-defined redox peaks observed in cyclic voltammetry.

Other Information.Test Conditions: 298 K, 0.5 M KCl electrolyte, scan rate: 10 mV/s
Other Information.Additional Info: Weak and deformed CV signal for N2-dried films; unresolvable response for supercritical CO2 dried or PDMS-treated films due to defect elimination.

Other Information.Test Conditions: 298 K, 0.5 M KCl electrolyte, scan rate: 10 mV/s
Other Information.Additional Info: No redox peaks observed in cyclic voltammetry, confirming size exclusion.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Selective permeability of Ru(NH3)6^3+ over Fe(phen)3^2+ confirmed by redox activity on FTO electrode.

Other Information.Additional Info: Defects formed during drying were mitigated by supercritical CO2 drying or PDMS treatment, enhancing molecular sieving capability.
